lines: 1. Gosemeria kw' Omokristo,'Kero are ense.Koremia enkoro buya,Ense y' obororo.Koremia enkoro buya,Ense y'obororo.
2. Gotworokia ens' engiya,'Baya baramenye.Toumerane n'abaya,TotatananekeToumerane n'abaya,Totatananeke
3. Ens' ebibe bitachiche,Amatemwa taiyo,Omogoko nomenyeo,Otaere rindeOmogoko nomenyeo,Otaere rinde
5. Amatuko era bwango,'Motoria nchwo bwango!Ntoganetie gokorora,Buna ore aye,Nagoika nka Igoro,Enka y'omogoko.
